values.code: instantiateActivity(cl: ClassLoader, className: String, intent: Intent?)
values.desc: Allows application to override the creation of activities.
Allows application to override the creation of the application object.
Selects the class loader which will be used by the platform to instantiate app components.
Allows application to override the creation of providers.

values.code: instantiateReceiver(cl: ClassLoader, className: String, intent: Intent?)
values.desc: Allows application to override the creation of receivers.

values.code: instantiateService(cl: ClassLoader, className: String, intent: Intent?)
values.desc: Allows application to override the creation of services.
